title: High speed internet,high ping
body: Hello!As the title says i have high speed internet im playing via cable not wi-fi,so thats out the list.When im playing i literally get 162 from the beggining and it doesnt move for the rest of the game ,like it doesnt even get to 161 neither does it get higher it just sort of freezes at that point.If anyone has a solution for this i'll be forever grateful.Cheers!

replies.body: Even though the quality of your net might be strong, there can be other issues or settings with your network failing to communicate with the game server.  Having a wired connection is good, but I also suggest going over every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
